page.title: 18Draycott Church
page.content:
The church, dedicated to St.Margaret of Antioch, Draycott-le-Moor stands on a small hill above an old Roman Road, now A50. It shares a 'Rector, the Revd.A.Wheeler with the neighbouring parish of Forsbrook.
The church has its own Sunday services but the congregations join regularly with each other. In the past two years the Sunday School has been restarted.
The tower has a fine peal of bells and many groups of bellringers visit. There is a church magazine published each month which gives details of services, who's who in the church and reports on the work of the parish.
It is a large parish but with a small church population.
